CustomField.formula:
SUBSTITUTE(
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(MobileCountry__c))), MID( TEXT(MobileCountry__c), FIND("+", TEXT(MobileCountry__c)) + 1, FIND(" ", TEXT(MobileCountry__c), FIND("+", TEXT(MobileCountry__c))) - FIND("+", TEXT(MobileCountry__c)) ), "" ) & IF( CONTAINS(MobilePhone , " "), SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone , " ", ""), IF( CONTAINS(MobilePhone , "+"), SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone , "+", ""), IF( CONTAINS(MobilePhone , "-"), SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone , "-", ""), IF( CONTAINS(MobilePhone , "("), SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone , "(", ""), IF( CONTAINS(MobilePhone , ")"), SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone , ")", ""), MobilePhone ) ) ) ) ), " ", "" )
CustomField.label: Mobile Number
